span.p:
definePrivateEventHandler HOF
parses Authorization: Token|Bearer
jwt.verify → injects auth.id into PrivateContext
throws 401/403 if requireAuth fails

span.p: v2 Auth (experimental)\nPOST /v2/auth/signup · login · logout\nZod validation · httpOnly cookie

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: authorMapper / profileMapper\ncomputes following bool\nfrom followedBy relation array
